parameters.query:
WITH quest_progress AS (
  SELECT 
    uq.id as quest_id,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE qr.status = 'concluida') as concluidas,
    COUNT(*) as total
  FROM usuarios_quest uq
  LEFT JOIN quests_recorrencias qr ON qr.usuarios_quest_id = uq.id
  WHERE uq.usuario_id = $1
  GROUP BY uq.id
)
SELECT 
  uo.id as objetivo_id,
  uo.titulo as objetivo_titulo,
  uo.is_padrao,
  av.nome as area_nome,
  av.icone as area_icone,
  uq.id as quest_id,
  COALESCE(uq.config->>'titulo', qc.titulo) as quest_titulo,
  qo.tipo_impacto,
  COALESCE(qp.concluidas, 0)::int as concluidas,
  COALESCE(qp.total, 0)::int as total,
  CASE WHEN COALESCE(qp.total, 0) > 0 
    THEN ROUND((COALESCE(qp.concluidas, 0)::numeric / qp.total) * 100)
    ELSE 0 
  END as percentual
FROM usuarios_objetivos uo
JOIN areas_vida_catalogo av ON uo.area_vida_id = av.id
LEFT JOIN quest_objetivos qo ON qo.objetivo_id = uo.id
LEFT JOIN usuarios_quest uq ON qo.usuarios_quest_id = uq.id
LEFT JOIN quests_catalogo qc ON uq.catalogo_id = qc.id
LEFT JOIN quest_progress qp ON qp.quest_id = uq.id
WHERE uo.usuario_id = $1
  AND uo.status = 'ativo'
ORDER BY uo.is_padrao DESC, uo.titulo, quest_titulo;
